nodes.text: The Spiral Galaxy was a casino on Vulta.
The Spiral Galaxy was located on a busy street near the spaceport on the planet Vulta. It was filled with smoke, shouts, flashing lights, and music. It also had a bar in it.

Zeerid Korr and Aryn Leneer went to the Spiral Galaxy to talk where no one would hear them. They sat at a corner table in the bar area and discussed Aryn going with Zeerid to Coruscant, the capital planet of the Galactic Republic. When he found out that his cargo was ready to go, he finally said that Aryn could go with him. They quickly left the casino when they noticed several people watching them.
